pr_title: [Slim4] Add integer formats support to Data Mocker

timeline.bodyText: What about throwing a warning/error saying it's not supported so the users get notified?
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
Accordingly to OAS spec any value can be used in format field. So it's not an exception to me. If this was a part of standalone library\package I would add throwing an exception, but it's autogenerated build, so nobody will catch exceptions in 99% cases.
However, PHP is able to raise warning or notice which doesn't stop code execution, but breaks JSON output.
replies.author: ybelenko

timeline.message: [Slim4] Support int32 and int64 data formats
[Slim4] Fix data format key in object mocking
